DOC.brief_summary: Background : Persistent nonspecific low back pain ( PNSLBP ) one common low back pain worldwide . Many intervention try include wet cup commonly use pain condition Saudi Arabia part world without solid scientific evidence . Aims : This study aim determine safety efficacy wet cup treat PNSLBP . Methods : This randomize wait-listed controlled clinical trial . Eligible patient history least 3 month PNSLBP randomize two group , 45 patient . The first group give wet-cupping treatment two acupuncture point urinary Bladder ( BL ) meridians among BL23 , BL24 BL25 , 6 time within 2 week . The second group serve control group . Usual care , include provide brochure exercise , general advice PNSLBP acetaminophen , allow group . Separate assessor participate outcome assessment . Investigators use 0 to100 numerical rating scale ( NRS ) pain , McGill Pain questionnaire pain intensity ( PPI ) Oswestry Disability Questionnaire ( ODQ ) , assess acetaminophen use safety issue . Expected Results : To provide data safety effectiveness wet cup treat PNSLBP open way integrative medicine Saudi Arabia

IV-To evaluate Safety wet cup SPECIFIC HYPOTHESIS : The hypothesis study improvement Numeric Rating Scale ( NRS ) Pain end study great Wet Cupping Treatment group Control group Overall Design : randomise , waiting-list control , open-label , parallel trial . - Study Type : Interventional - Condition : Persistent Non Specific Low Back Pain ( PNSLBP ) Case definition parameter : - Low back pain : define pain discomfort , localize , costal margin inferior gluteal fold , without refer leg pain. , - Persistent low back pain : define low back pain persisting least 12 week . We deal specifically repeat , short bout pain . - Nonspecific low back pain : define '' low back pain attributable recognizable , know specific pathology ( e.g . infection , tumour , osteoporosis , fracture , structural deformity , inflammatory disorder ( e.g . ankylose spondylitis ) , radicular syndrome caudal equine syndrome ) . DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients nonspecific low back pain least 12 week . 2 . Interested use wet cup therapy 3 . Age equal 18 year 60 year age . 1Patients low back pain due specific know etiological cause ( infection , tumor , osteoporosis , ankylose spondylitis , fracture , inflammatory process , radicular syndrome , cauda equinal syndrome ) . 2Patients inappropriate wet cup treatment . ◦AIDS , Active Hepatitis , Tuberculosis , Syphilis .
